attachments.title: job: Don't mark as redundant if deps are relevant by keur · Pull Request #14086 · systemd/systemd
attachments.text: In the steps given in #13850, the resulting graph looks like: C (Anchor) -> B -> A Since B is inactive, it will be flagged as redundant and removed from the transaction, causing A to get gar...

text: Windows の zsh は msys2 か cygwin しかないですね。むかーしむかしは本当に native な zsh あったけどもう開発止まってしまった。
